short_summary: The Department of National Defence requires multiple Victoria-class spares.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
**Multiple Victoria-Class Spares**
=====================================================

**Procurement Number:** PW-22-01012143
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-220135/C
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-02
**Closing Date:** 2023-01-23T14:00:00

**Procurement Overview:**
========================

The Department of National Defence is inviting offers for the supply of communication, electrical and electronic equipment components for the Canadian Armed Forces. The procurement objective is to secure the required items from qualified suppliers.

**Items Required:**
-----------------

* GSIN N5825, NSN 15-016-5956, Transmitter - Radio Navigation (RAC-5023/19, A1615), quantity 2
* GSIN N2541, NSN 20-A0H-8678, SRT-500/D Installation Kit (RAB-5592-01, 0MYF6), quantity 2
* GSIN N5985, NSN 15-016-6217, Antenna Control Unit (RAC-6962/01, A0069), quantity 1
* GSIN N5996, NSN 20-010-1209, Amplifier - Radio Frequency (RAC-5025/03, 0MYF6), quantity 2

**Delivery Locations:**
------------------

The delivery of the required items will be to the following Canadian Forces Bases:

* CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Additional Requirements:**
-------------------------

* Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE they are offering.
* The procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:

Aïcha Diallo
AICHA.DIALLO@forces.gc.ca
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Attachments:**
--------------

The procurement documents, including the Request for Proposal and Annex A, can be downloaded from the following links:

* [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/e8eb22aa8010338c6c0b21d35cd051df/w8482-220135-c_-_rfp.pdf](
